summary: What is stranger than the big hole that opens up in Lucy Sherrington's living room floor? As it turns out, love.
cast: Alison Brie|Justin Chatwin|Colin Hanks|Mark Forward|Christopher Cordell|Lisa Berry|Justin Bigelli|Robin Brûlé|Mason Cardwell|Marium Carvell|Julian De Zotti|Jayne Eastwood|Dylan Everett|Samuel Faraci|Paul Fauteux|Barry Flatman|Jen Goodhue|Sabrina Grdevich|Terry Jones|Jameson Kraemer|Siobhan Murphy|Billy Otis|Aaron Poole|Jonathan Potts|Martin Roach
title: No Stranger Than Love
